title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Voodoo for Peace"", ca. 1984
medium: Black and color marking pens (?), brush and watercolor/inks (?), graphite touches on white tracing paper
description: Four panel screen in form of four figures, each composed of different, colorful, decorative geometric shapes.  Reading from left to right, figure with eye-shaped head; figure with headdress of cans and feathers; figure with king's crown; figure with target head.  Each figure wears a short straw skirt over long red base.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Voodoo for Peace"", ca. 1984.
ca. 1984. Black and color marking pens (?), brush and watercolor/inks (?), graphite touches on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-108.
